GraphChartJs Module¶

Parameters

property js¶

Javascript base function

Return all the Javascript functions defined in the framework. THis is an entry point to the full Javascript ecosystem.

Returns

A Javascript object

Return type

JsChartJs.JsChart

label(i, name)¶

Change the series name

Parameters

  • i – Integer. The series index according to the y_columns

  • name – String. The new name to be set
